text: James Webster "Jim" Hill (born October 21, 1946 in San Antonio, Texas) is a retired American football defensive back. He played in the National Football League. He is now a Los Angeles-based sportscaster. He is a Studio Host for the both the LA Dodgers and LA Lakers games. He played college football at Texas A&M; Universityâ€“Kingsville. In the National Football League he played for the Green Bay Packers and San Diego Chargers. He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. ==References== *Jim Hill's bio on CBS2.com ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Olympic Games broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters
title: Jim Hill
